alert.note: Alert for Marion; Talbot; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 9:16PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Marion, southern Talbot and western Taylor Counties through 945 PM EST... At 916 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Marion Estates, or 12 miles south of Talbotton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Butler, Junction City, Geneva, Juniper, Baldwinville, Charing, Oakland, Mauk, Box Springs, Howard, Marion Estates, Prattsburg and Wesley Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
